# fmr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

* 26/04/2021 0.0.0.9000 The first commit where I install an array of functions I expect to have to use as well as some example data files.



The goal of fmr is to provide functions and data for use in Fisheries Modelling using R

## Installation

You can install development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("haddonm/fmr")
```
